tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE copyright_certificates (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    document_url VARCHAR(255),
    title VARCHAR(255),
    copyright_holder VARCHAR(255),
    file_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE images (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
      name STRING,
      image_data BYTES
    )

CREATE TABLE documents (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
      title STRING,
      document_type STRING,
      document_data BYTES
    )

CREATE TABLE intellectual_property (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
      name STRING,
      date_created DATE,
      owner STRING
    )

CREATE TABLE patents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_number VARCHAR(255),
    patent_title VARCHAR(255),
    patent_description TEXT,
    date_filed DATE,
    inventor VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_images (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    patent_id INT,
    image_url TEXT,
    image_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE copyright_documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT,
    copyright_id INT,
    document_url TEXT,
    document_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    patent_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE copyright_certificates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    certificate_number VARCHAR(20)
);
